channel.title: Books Art Poetry Collage on Jeffrey Cyphers Wright

item.title: Party Everywhere
item.description: Party Everywhere 2014 Xanadu Press ISBN:0-9760793-9-9 This poem is a manifesto for the nascient ‘eventworks’ movement that stresses collaboration, community, and cause-based art. Welcome to the new world ardor. –Michael Andre A poet’s guide to social engagement Write your own “ticket” Sing here Remember, you are a can, not a can not Centerfold from Party Everywhere Wright created this book-length poem, photo-collage, photo-assemblage, thanks to a summer residency at eMediaLoft in New York City.
